snippet: Mr. Trump’s attack on Francis reflected a political calculation that criticizing the pope will not hurt him with conservatives — and might even improve his standing in South Carolina.
abstract: Donald J Trump rebukes Pope Francis after pontiff's remark that Trump 'is not Christian' in proposing deportations of illegal immigrants and building wall with Mexico; presidential candidate, in move that could possibly attract social conservatives but alienate Catholic voters, says Francis' criticisms are 'disgraceful' and 'unbelievable.'

byline.contributor: Ashley Parker and Jim Yardley contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s attack on Francis reflected a political calculation that criticizing the pope will not hurt him with conservatives — and might even improve his standing in South Carolina.

headline.main: Donald Trump Fires Back at Sharp Rebuke by Pope Francis
headline.print_headline: Trump Fires Back at Sharp Rebuke by Pope Francis
